basicInfo.name: Karon
basicInfo.flavor: Karon developed into a Master Elementalist, ruling over the Mystic Woods and its spirits. His nature magic is second to none.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.name: Nature's Healing
Skill 1.desc:
Single Ally
 - Heals HP equal to 200% of the caster's Magic Attack.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes 230% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Changes Number of Targets: To 3 Allies

Skill 2.name: Nature's Breath
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 105% of the caster's Magic Attack.
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Healing: HP Recovery amount becomes 125% of Magic Attack.
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Reduces Cooldown: To 91s.

Passive.name: Nature's Protection
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Bleed Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Bleed Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 115% of the caster's Magic Attack upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Barrier absorption becomes equal to 135% of Magic Attack.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Evan, Karin, nature, bears, deer, horoscopes, accepting fate, peace, harmony, dewdrops
profile.dislikes: Blood, violence, destruction, those that damage nature
profile.story: Karon developed into a Master Elementalist, ruling over the Mystic Woods and its spirits. His nature magic is second to none.

basicInfo.name: Karon
basicInfo.flavor: Although he may come across as prim, Karon's unparalleled love for the Mystic Woods helped him become an elite Elementalist.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 90% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 90% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Nature's Healing
Skill 1.desc:
Single Ally
 - Heals HP equal to 180% of the caster's Magic Attack.

Skill 2.name: Nature's Breath
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 100% of the caster's Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Nature's Protection
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Bleed Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Bleed Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 105% of the caster's Magic Attack upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

profile.dislikes: Blood, violence, destruction, those that damage nature

basicInfo.name: Karon
basicInfo.flavor: Karon is a druid that takes care of the Mother Tree, the largest tree in the Mystic Woods. He might come across as priggish, but he strictly abides the laws of nature.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Magic Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Nature's Healing
Skill 1.desc:
Single Ally
 - Heals HP equal to 160% of the caster's Magic Attack.

Skill 2.name: Nature's Breath
Skill 2.desc:
All Allies
 - Heals HP equal to 90% of the caster's Magic Attack.

Passive.name: Nature's Protection
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Bleed Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Bleed Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants a Barrier equal to 95% of the caster's Magic Attack upon activating a skill 1 time(s). [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]
